content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41, -82)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) processing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) transferring items to the furnace.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15, -50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) processing iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items to the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities due to collision or incorrect positioning
- Ensure there is enough space and no obstructions when placing entities. Consider increasing spacing, changing direction, or adjusting the reference position to avoid collisions with existing entities.

### Errors when inserting items without available inventory
- Verify that the required items are available in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity.
